content: I think I'll start with some classic summer tunes like "Summertime" and "Summer Breeze". Those songs always bring back memories of warm summer days and family gatherings. Then, I can move on to some old family favorites like "Unchained Melody" and "Can't Help Falling in Love". Those songs are always crowd-pleasers and are sure to get everyone singing along. Finally, I might throw in some acoustic/folk favorites like "Fire and Rain" and "Homeward Bound" to round out the setlist.
